titleStmt.title: A Letter from an eminent merchant in Ostend containing an account of a strange and monstrous birth hapned there : a woman being brought to bed of two children which are joined together by the crowns of their heads : he being an eye-witness thereof.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Stans and sold by R. Janeway,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
